Pre-Game Insights: India coach Rahul Dravid discussed the possibility of selecting Yuzvendra Chahal or Kuldeep Yadav for the Super Eight fixture against Afghanistan, considering the conditions in Barbados might be different from those in New York.
Others: The India squad for the tournament contains four spinners, but only two were utilized in New York, bowling just nine overs across the three completed matches.
Super Eight Fixtures: vs Afghanistan – Thu, 20 June 2024, Barbados, 10:30 AM local time
vs Bangladesh – Sat, 22 June 2024, Antigua and Barbuda, 10:30 AM local time
vs Australia – Mon, 24 June 2024, St. Lucia, 10:30 AM local time
